categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Salvation was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate used as a medical frigate by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

The Salvation was created for the 1993 LucasArts video game Star Wars: X-Wing and appears in one of three possible cutscenes when the player craft is destroyed, in which they are taken to the Salvation for treatment.
